Text:
How to get any torrent:
http://www.ghacks.net/2012/01/14/how-to-turn-a-magnet-link-into-a-torrent-file/

NOTE: This only works with a client that supports magnet links AND can generate a torrent from the metadata from magnet links (ex: uTorrent).
Installed fine but when I try to convert it says "Set default printer failed!"
